original_title: Solos: The Jazz Sessions - Lee Konitz
overview: One of the most individual of all alto saxophone players, the cool-toned Lee Konitz has always had a strong musical curiosity that has led him to consistently take chances and stretch himself, usually quite successfully. SOLOS: THE JAZZ SESSIONS spotlights unaccompanied performances by some of the legends and bright young stars of the jazz world.
title: Solos: The Jazz Sessions - Lee Konitz
